mapper.sql: INST_ID, PARTITION_ID, VPN_ID, MEMBER_ROLE_TYPE, MEMBER_ROLE_CODE, MEMBER_ROLE_ID, MEMBER_ROLE_NUMBER, DISCNT_PRIORITY, P_VPN_TAG, START_DATE, END_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_DEPART_ID, UPDATE_STAFF_ID
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM tf_f_user u,tf_f_user_member m,tf_f_customer c WHERE m.VPN_ID=c.CUST_ID AND m.MEMBER_ROLE_NUMBER=u.SERIAL_NUMBER AND u.USER_ID =#{userId}

mapper.update:
update tf_f_user_member
VPN_ID = #{vpnId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEMBER_ROLE_TYPE = #{memberRoleType,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = #{memberRoleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ROLE_ID = #{memberRoleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

UPDATE_DEPART_ID = #{updateDepartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_STAFF_ID = #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INST_ID = #{instId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PARTITION_ID = #{partitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tf_f_user_member set VPN_ID = #{vpnId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEMBER_ROLE_TYPE = #{memberRoleType,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = #{memberRoleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_ROLE_ID = #{memberRoleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEMBER_ROLE_NUMBER = #{memberRoleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCNT_PRIORITY = #{discntPriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, P_VPN_TAG = #{pVpnTag,jdbcType=CHAR}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DEPART_ID = #{updateDepartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_STAFF_ID = #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INST_ID = #{instId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PARTITION_ID = #{partitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
